reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As a senior I now have to sit at my job. I am up and down off my chair umpteen times a day. This pad fits the size of my chair well, and the cushion is good about staying put. I like the cloth handle as this senior has to carry water, my cane and my therapy workout sheet to my work station. It helped me to recover from sciatica, raising the height of the chair and cushioning my thigh muscle. I would buy this product again, possibly one for home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm and slip proof
reviews.reviewText: Based on the last 2 weeks of use, this has been firm and slip proof. Overall it provides comfort and the adjustment of the needed height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick, plush and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to use on a new mesh office chair. Cushion is thick, comfortable, wide enough to fit width of chair, nice material with non-slip underside. My chair offers lower back support, tho the cushion's thickness raises my body up so back is no longer aligned with support feature... which I need. Debating on returning for this reason, thus the minus of 1 star. Otherwise the product is recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and helpful to lower back
reviews.reviewText: This was an excellent purchase, well made, and reasonable. My husband finds it very helpful to his lower back and the covers are washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cushion I bought a low model car and the seat is very uncomfortable but with this cushion it’s awesome and it fits my big butt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not work out for me
reviews.reviewText: So this hair-pad is well made but was too large for my rolling walker sear. I should have just gone with the smaller size bc I’m 170#. But my purpose for buying it was to increase the hieight of my seat so I void get up out of it easier. I thought bigger was better but not so.I believe that the smaller sized one will be higher bc it won’t flatten out like this bigger one does.We shall see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big enough and thick enough. Very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The seat cushion covers your entire seat surface. You don't have to worry about trying to center your butt on a small cushion, this cushion is big, thick, and feels great! (that's what she said)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is perfect for my recliner. It’s very comfortable and helps my back and legs to feel better

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo mejor que pude comprar después de mi cirugia
reviews.reviewText: Espectacular, son un persona muy alta y recién me recupero de una cirugía.Este cojín es perfecto para lo que necesito....

I bought this to replace an older seat cushion that was meant to help back pain with a cut out in the middle. That was comfortable as long as you remained perfectly aligned on the cushion. This model is perfect for my needs and has been very comfortable. I am using it on on office chair that has some cushioning already and this cushion adds just the right amount of comfort. The extra large size is a great fit. I doubt this would be as comfortable if used on a wooden chair unless you are petite. It had minimal odor even right out of the vacuum sealed bag. It is holding up well and seems to be well made.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hands down the best cushion for large office chairs
reviews.reviewText: Premise: my almost 4 year old leather office chair is at the end of its life and the seat has pretty much lost its cushion (i.e. it's flat). In order to make do with my chair I needed to find an actual good seat cushion instead of the pillow I've been using.I've bought many of these memory foam seat cushions from Amazon and had to return all of them because they were either too firm, too small, had weird designs, and just didn't match the contours of my big office chair; those ones clearly had other purposes to them (i.e. designed for medical issues with the spine or something). This, however, was not one of them.This one's noticeably on the softer side, yet it does not sink down and compress to your weight. Soft yet bouncy is what I'd describe the feeling, which is perfect in emulating the soft bouncy/springy cushioning of some high-end office chairs (e.g. Serta Hensley).Not only that, but this cushion is the only one that conforms perfectly to the shape and size of my seat. The rounded contours at the back and sloped front really helps make it the perfect seat cushion for office chairs (and definitely for gaming chairs as well).Everyone has their own specific needs, but if you're like me: just a regular guy who needs to find a more comfier seat cushion for their big and tall office chair (or gaming chairs), than this cushion is the one. I'd highly recommend this one.
El cojín tiene el tamaño preciso para soportar largas jornadas de trabajo. Recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is big and flat, but not very firm.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a cushion that would be big enough to cover the whole seat and also wanted one that is flat with no ergo shaping built in. This fits both those criteria, but the main issue I have with this one is that the foam is too soft. The cushion provides some extra padding but it would be better with a high density more ridged foam. Overall it is pretty decent, but if you are looking for something that is firm, this probably isn't the one.
